tool_description: Generates personalized responses to customer reviews by combining analysis insights, templates, and customization rules to create contextually appropriate automated replies.

specific_mentions.description: Specific items mentioned in review to address

business_name.description: Business name to include in response

include_call_to_action.description: Whether to include follow-up action request

response_length.description: Desired response length: short, medium, long

sentiment.description: Review sentiment: positive, negative, or neutral

escalation_needed.description: Whether response should indicate escalation to human agent

error_messages: Empty required fields: Both review_text and response_template parameters are required.
Invalid response length: Use one of [short, medium, long].
Invalid sentiment: Use one of [positive, negative, neutral].
Invalid priority level: Use one of [high, medium, low].
Template formatting error: Response template contains invalid placeholder formatting.
usage: Provide review_text, response_template, and sentiment as required parameters. Add customer_name, specific_mentions, and business_name for personalization. Configure response_length, priority_level, and escalation_needed based on the review context.

generated_response.description: Complete generated response text ready for posting

personalization_elements.description: Elements that were personalized in the response

response_word_count.description: Word count of the generated response

includes_escalation.description: Whether the response includes escalation language
